overview: Imagine a beautiful day at sea, the magnificent waters allowing you to feel weightless and serene.  And then you see it - the infamous single fin moving slowly in your direction.  You panic...why?  Man has always lived in fear of the shark because these predators represent for most, the epitome of evil and voraciousness.  Ease your fears and join John Stoneman as he sets out to dispel many of the myths that surround the shark.  But, don't get to comfortable.  As John Stoneman will point out, there are certain species that must be feared.
title: Encounters with Sharks
